html:
9.26.18  11:29 pm   what is your opinion on the letter "a" in terms of neoliberalism and centrist-marxist ideals?

     it is pretty good

9.26.18  11:16 pm   Seriously have you heard your own music on reference monitors? I have you hooked up to an early 70s reciever through 90s tower home theatre speakers.  All of your bassline are so funkily mesmorizing. I'm going to say better than Beatles. I seriously can't think of a better bassist.  Even when they aren't leveled, it's in like that realtek ADC sorta way.  You are a true perfectionist & a gentleman my good sir!  Yo my Felicia, Propecia.

     that's very nice of you. i am still looking for decent monitor speakers. i bought monitor speakers but they sound so insanely bad i only use them as tables. i do all my mixes on ear buds and then check it in the car and correct any nightmares there may be. i've learned a few tricks, but i have a long way to go. you are very generous

9.26.18  11:03 pm   What's the matter 30fps pleb? Didn't down enough ram?

     i dare you to even figure out what frame rate i use, using your eyes alone

9.26.18  10:47 pm   if you put a bagel in the dvd player will it play an informative documentary about bagels or will it play an artistic short film about bagels

     it plays the bagel itself

9.26.18  10:18 pm   how do u offend someone without being overtly offensive?

     you could try being covertly offensive

9.26.18  10:04 pm   i dont get it. whenever i say "fuck it" and make a song without thinking about it at all, people always end up liking it more. you would think it would be the other way around

     ah, that is because the song always knows how it wants to go. it's sometimes best not to interfere

9.26.18  10:01 pm   what to do when i do something stupid and then i feel dumb and sad for being stupid?

     try to think of something more stupid. raise the stakes

9.26.18  9:59 pm   Its been a very long time since you've posted any notes.

     that's not entirely true

      Where have they gone?

     they are where they have always been, on the notes page. except there are always more than there used to be

      is there nothing noteworthy?

     i think the ones there were noteworthy, but in more recent times i have found an even more noteworthy thing which i had been striving for the whole time, which is audio / visual content

9.26.18  9:40 pm   a key component of how most are experiencing your work On-Line is the visual aspect. do you have any plans in mind as to how that can be translated creatively to a live show setting?

     not the animated part

9.26.18  9:01 pm   when you make pb and j sandwiches, do you put the peanut butter and jelly on one slice of bread, or two seperate pieces?

     use only 1 slice. put peanut butter on one side and jelly on the other. that is what i like to call an 'advandwich' or advanced sandwich

9.26.18  8:50 pm   Whats your favorite david bowie song (or one that you really like)?

     i don't think i am legally allowed to say

9.26.18  8:42 pm   DO YOU EVER FEEL LIKE IF YOU DON'T GET YOUR SHIT DONE YOU MIGHT SET THINGS ON FIRE

     yes

9.26.18  8:25 pm   did the popular inspirational quotes really works?

     some of them can

9.26.18  8:24 pm   i'd like to order the first letter of the title of your newest song. can you please put it on this plate: _______

     t

9.26.18  8:10 pm   Why do things keep getting worse?

     to balance out how much better they are also getting

9.26.18  7:42 pm   Do your songs share a universe?

     they share the one that you and i live in, but in addition they also can share every other imaginable world

      Like could steve travel to New Canaan?

     yes but it probably wouldn't happen

9.26.18  7:24 pm   bill I need inspiration for a song, what do you suggest?

     
intensive
credibility

9.26.18  7:14 pm   Do you believe time is an illusion?

     no

      A man made construct? 

     definitely no, time existed way before them

9.26.18  7:14 pm   Why is everything 

     could be fun

9.26.18  6:25 pm   Hey Bill, I see a lot of people attempt to break down the meaning of your videos. Do any of your videos actually have some kind of deeper meaning,

     than what

      or are they just random and nonsensical?

     they are much more than that, that would suck

9.26.18  6:20 pm   I play acoustic instruments and I'm thinking about trying to switch to electric. Is there a big difference between the two, or will I get the hang of it rather quickly?

     there are differences and similarities between every instrument. but you didn't say what any of the instruments are

9.26.18  5:40 pm   Do aliens prefer blues or rhythm changes? 

     you must ask yourself. the alien is you

9.26.18  5:16 pm   any tips on socializing?

     you must think like the socialist

9.26.18  4:49 pm   would you ever consider doing a "more serious" style of music or just changing your style up eventually

     i'm sure i have but it's not entirely clear what you mean

9.26.18  3:43 pm   which of the 50 ways to leave your lover is the superior method

     don't need to discuss much

9.26.18  3:29 pm   Ok, so you are obviously a really good drummer, judging from your crazy accurate air-drumming, but we don't really get to enjoy  the full extent of your talents. Do something about it tomorrow. Or are you chicken? Gwaaap wak wak gwak gwak. ?

     i am, but i am getting along just fine. one day i will be in a properly isolated studio and you will see many many types of things i have waited a long time to show you

9.26.18  3:12 pm   Lesbianism, when?

     it remains constant

9.26.18  2:36 pm   another happy person winning the first hour

For the past couple years, I've been starting the day on medicine, and I have to wait an hour before eating, and I've mostly been pissing away that time feeling gross and uncomfortable and telling myself I can't focus enough to be productive. Essentially losing the first hour.

But I got frustrated enough I said fuck it no excuses and followed your advice and I got so much done. It didn't even hurt, so it almost feels like it doesn't count because I've trained myself to view effort as painful, but whatever I'll take it and keep doing this and reprogram myself probably. Anyway, thank you so, so much. I didn't think I could do it, but I did it, and I feel amazing, and my life is going to be much better now.

     it's a pretty cool trick. i only learned it recently but i should have known it a long time ago

9.26.18  2:22 pm   What to do if song is stuck in head? I've already sung "Girl from Iponema" 5 times

     listen to another song more

9.26.18  2:08 pm   where should i store my cabbages?

     how about in the cabbage patch

9.26.18  1:34 pm   Why no grammar?

     whenst

9.26.18  1:22 pm   how do i become brave?

     sign up for a free trial membership with no money in your bank account

9.26.18  12:26 pm   If most people are strangers, how can they be strange? That would make strange normal, which is not strange.

     this is all due to relativity. there are some theories about this

9.26.18  12:24 pm   are you ever going to start posting on the jazz, improv or reality pages again? or journal

     yes

9.26.18  12:15 pm   Can you go back to new canaan and write new canaan part 2?

     new canaan was already part 2 of 'my wednesday vacation'

9.26.18  11:58 am   which planet is the most sexy?

     i was going to say venus but i changed my mind it's neptune

9.26.18  11:49 am   would you rather be in deep space or the true bottom of the ocean? or would you rather be split in two and be in both at the same time?

     i am holding out for other scenarios

9.26.18  11:36 am   I'm with 60fps guy on cranking it.

     i'm not doing it

9.26.18  11:01 am   Have you ever rigged the election? Not nessecarily of the president, but of anyone. We don't discriminate here.

     no but hopefully i will get a chance to rig one in the future

9.26.18  10:35 am   Any plans to add any new shirt designs to tour shop anytime soon.  I'd love to see some that relate to some of your recent songs :)

     that would be nice but i have decided to do the more irresponsible thing and make more new songs instead

9.26.18  9:14 am   What's your favourite type of cheese?

     the moon

9.26.18  9:14 am   9.25.18 9:21 am well when you put it that way i can't really think of a good answer but i sure would like to. i guess the only real consequence is that i just can't get behind some of the things i write. like they don't make me as proud as other things. how can i get the most pride and dumbness from something I'm writing?

     well this might not be the only way, but i'll give you an example. in 2007 i wrote a journal entry (or freestyle ramble thing) which sucked. i did this every day but they didn't always suck. but on a particular day in 2007, i made one that really sucked. fast forward to 2015, i'm writing for vine, because i just tricked myself into having to do 7 videos a week, so i needed material. so i started playing a game where i randomly select a day from the past and then check to see what i was doing or saying/writing about on that particular day, and try to write a short vine-able jingle video which matches the way my life is going at that point. i found an entry from 2003 or something that said 'can your life withstand the pressure of the pen' or something, and i thought about it a little and came up with the "Are you the Real You?" jingle. another randomly selected day put me at jan 20, 2011, where i had been fervently studying the emotional implications of different chord sequences, song forms, etc. really was on an obsessive scientific rampage trying to really figure out what is making music tick. so based on this (in this 2015 writing session) i wrote "i'm gonna figure out what everything means." then i did the random selection again and it came up to something from 2007 that was just a page of writing which seemed to have absolutely no creative value, no informational value, no entertainment value, no biographical value, absolutely no value on the page. just a terrible terrible page. so naturally the jingle idea that comes to mind goes like this. ok, next pick. so i do the random date selection again, and the next one that comes up is actually the very next page from the crappy 2007 one i just did. it's the next day. out of thousands of days that could have been picked, the exact next day came up. and it sucked just as much. it was terrible. i think i was at a really useless/hopeless place at that time, which is unusual for me, but that's just the way i was feeling during that time, i assume. another totally garbage page, very similar to the previous. so now i'm thinking (on this 2015 writing session) i'm feeling totally screwed, because i feel like i just did this one. which leads to the only obvious solution which would be this. i think i had a point in here somewhere

9.26.18  9:01 am   are you disciplined?

     almost

9.26.18  8:59 am   what should i be for halloween?

     the internet

9.26.18  8:49 am   So Bill, tell us, what are the amazing properties of Dust�? Being one of the most avid advocates of our product, it only feels right asking you about Dust�!

     it's ok

     i don't think so but i have not yet been tested

9.26.18  8:09 am   did you invent yourself? asking for a friend

     doing it now

     to keep you coming back for more

     i just looked it up and i think it is rated fairly

     i am not
